alert.note: Alert for Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 9:28PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Shannon County through 1015 PM CDT... At 928 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Ellington, or 19 miles north of Van Buren, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ozark National Scenic Riverways and Midridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
